Articles.Content:
Welcome to the Spacecraft Exchange: Aerospace division! Post all of your favorite aircraft here. Please remember though, this thread is STOCK PARTS ONLY. I myself will be posting my RegalAirlines craft on here, as well as my new NINJA LAC series of craft! Feel free to ask questions or post any craft you want. Here are the rules to post a craft:

1. Must include picture and have center of thrust in-line with center of mass

2. Must include how many kerbals it carries, fuel amount, and a detailed description of what the craft is intended to do

3. Must have .CRAFT download

4. Most of all, just have fun posting craft!
Isn't it just aeronautics if there's no spacecraft?

Isn't it just aeronautics if there's no spacecraft?

Technically, i think it still is Aerospace because of SSTOs
